s = b - 1
l = x2 - x1 + 1

(x, y, x1, y1) = list(map(int, input().split()))
res1 = (y1 - y + 1) // 2
res2 = (y1 - y + 1) - res1
resx1 = (x1 - x + 1) // 2
resx2 = (x1 - x + 1) - resx1
print(res1 * resx1 + res2 * resx2)

x1, y1, x2, y2 = [int(i) for i in input().split()]

dx = x2 - x1 + 1
dy = (y2 - y1) // 2 + 1

if dx%2 == 1:
	ans = dy * (dx//2 + 1) + (dy-1) * (dx//2)
else:
	ans = dx*dy

print(ans)

s = ((y2 - y1) // 2 + 1) * ((x2 - x1) // 2 + 1) + ((y2 - y1) // 2 * (x2 - x1) // 2)

x, u, y, v = list(map(int, input().split()))
N, M = y - x + 1, v - u + 1
n, m = (N >> 1) * (N&1), (M >> 1) * (M&1)
print((N - n)*(M - m) + n*m)

x1, y1, x2, y2 = map(int, input().split())

d = (x2 - x1) // 2 + 1
e = (y2 - y1) // 2 + 1
if (y2 - y1) % 2 == 0:
	ans = d * e + (d - 1) * (e - 1)
else:
	ans = (2 * d - 1) * (e - 1)
print(ans)
